item.description:
Saturday, June 28th, 8pm performance at the North Shore Music Theatre.
Meet Jill/Chuck in the lobby at 7:30pm...if you arrive after curtain opens, they will NOT seat you with the group until after intermission.

They are holding 20 tickets for our group for the performance on Saturday night, June 28th, at 8:00 pm at $30.00 per ticket, usually $60.00
Interested people can call the Group Sales ticket office at 978-232-7202 and reference my name (Jill) and the Merrimack Group. You have to pre-pay for the your ticket in order for them to hold it.

Since this is a Saturday night performance, perhaps we can plan to meet for dinner beforehand at a local eatery. Please indicate in your RSVP if you'd like to join for dinner, and if so, add any suggestions you may have for nearby places to dine! We can post that as a separate meetup listing later...

The play is Contact:
The New England Regional Theatre Premiere!
Winner Of 4 TonyÂ® Awards!

Contact was the hit of the 2000 Broadway season and a big feather in director/choreographer Susan Stroman's cap. It's a haunting, moving, 'dance play' that's divided into three parts.
item.how_to_find_us: Jill and Chuck will meet everyone in the lobby
item.why: Everyone had a great time at the last show, a great little theater and half price seats, Thanks Jill. :-)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: North Shore Music Theatre
